title: My Boyfriend from the Physics Department - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Comedic Undertone   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Pets
author: 笑佳人
description:
Meng Wan opened a noodle shop in the vicinity of University Z and business was going pretty well.

Mother Meng was very proud until the neighbor across them, Lu Chaoqing, returned from the United States. Mother Meng started to harp, “That Chaoqing is only two years older than you, but he is now a Physics professor in University Z, very prestigious, look!”

Later, Meng Wan and Lu Chaoqing were passionately kissing in the elevator, Mother Meng outside the door was shocked!>
